entry.title: Crystal - Lactose Free Non Hydrogenated Margarine - 907 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crystal
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.99

Crystal - Soft Non Hydrogenated Margarine  - 2 Lbs

  • No trans fat
  • Lactose-free
  • Vegan
  • Non-hydrogenated
  • No artificial flavors
  • Source of omega-3 fatty acids
  • 907g
  • Keep refrigerated

Create a delicious cake that disappears quickly and other delectable treats with this trans free solid margarine. It adds a creamy butter-like flavor to dishes, but contains no cholesterol unlike traditional butter. This margarine is perfect for baking fresh treats to perfection. Plus, it also is an excellent flavor enhancer in sauces, soups, and gravies or use it as a spread. It features the same rich butter flavor your customers know and love at a more economical price. Use it to create delectable and savory dishes that keep your customers coming back for more!

With subtle flavour and a soft consistency, Crystal Margarine is formulated to be directly spreadable from refrigerated temperatures and is ideal for most cooking applications. Made from non-hydrogenated vegetable oil and canola oil, our products are vegan, gluten-free, lactose-free and are an excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids.

We proudly use environmentally friendly packaging. Our Crystal Margarine containers are reusable, dishwasher, and microwave safe.

entry.title: Black Diamond - Lactose Free White Old Cheddar - 400g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Diamond
Type: FOOD
Price: 7.99

Cheddar cheese is the most widely consumed cheese in the world, making it essential in your kitchen

Cheddar can be used to add a savory taste to a variety of dishes! It's perfect for your gourmet mac-n-cheese or signature cheddar-infused hamburger, as well as using for sandwiches, specialty pizzas, or garnishing soups and salads. Melt and drizzle this cheese over your warm pretzels or use with your loaded nachos to create deliciously cheesy appetizers. You can even use it for filling your buffet salad bar.

While baking in the oven it creates a deliciously creamy and slightly crisp coating over the noodles, and guests will love the slightly bitter taste of the cheese contrasted with the creamy texture while eating this dish. Use this cheese as the perfect complement to your roast beef sandwiches, kielbasa or bratwurst, or on a baked potato

No matter what it's used for, customers won't be able to get enough of this cheese's buttery rich cheddar flavor!

Black Diamond - Lactose Free White Old Cheddar - 400g

entry.title: Gay Lea - Sour Cream 14% Lactose Free - 450 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gay Lea
Type: FOOD
Price: 3.99

Gay Lea - 14% Sour Cream Lactose Free - 450 ml

From loaded nachos, to a classic baked potato, to tacos, a dollop of this sour cream enhances any dish! Featuring a rich, tangy flavor with an ultra-creamy texture, this versatile ingredient pairs as well with your hot, spicy foods as it does with cool, sweet dishes. Not just for use as a topping, sour cream makes an excellent base for a variety of dips and dressings! Whip up an extra-creamy macaroni salad, serve a delicious french onion dip, or create a mouthwatering avocado cream great for dipping or smoothing onto sandwiches. This powerhouse ingredient also adds a tangier, richer flavor to your dessert products; use to lighten the heaviness of cheesecake, or enhance the tenderness of your muffins and Bundt cakes.

This grade A sour cream is a valuable addition to virtually any foodservice establishment. Made with all natural ingredients, its hot fill packaging process and minimal stabilization allows this sour cream to arrive in an "unbroken" state. The perfect ingredient to keep on hand to embellish any dish, provide your guests with high quality, fresh foods like this sour cream.

entry.title: Silk Soy - Milk Original Dairy-Free - 1.89 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Silk
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.59

Silk Soy - Milk Original Dairy-Free - 1.89 L

Try Silk® Original Soy Beverage anywhere you enjoy dairy milk—over your cereal, in your coffee or simply by itself. It has as much calcium as dairy milk, and is a good source of wholesome, nutritionally-complete soy protein.
• Made with whole organic soybeans
• 7 grams of soy protein
• As much calcium as dairy milk
• Cholesterol-free
• Low saturated fat
• Free of dairy, lactose, gluten, casein, egg and carrageenan
• Verified by the Non-GMO Project’s product verification program
• No artificial colours, flavours or funny business

Serve your guests the wholesome flavor of this milk with their meals. 
This grade A milk is ultra-pasteurized to extend its shelf-life, making it perfect for supplying in your cafe, hotel breakfast bar, or bakery. Serve the milk plain with your patron's breakfast, pour over cereal, or use to create specialty lattes and teas.

It's also great for using in smoothies along with fresh cut fruit and organic yogurt to make an energy-boosting, on-the-go drink. From bakeries to fine dining establishments, milk and milk products are used to enhance almost any dish or dessert. The staple of any fridge or freezer, dairy products are essential for baking, cooking, and complementing your freshly prepared dishes.

Our wide variety of milk, includes homo whole milk, skim, partly skimmed, Lactose free milk, Soy Milk substitute, Chocolate, Strawberry, Caramel milkshakes are important ingredients to stock at your breakfast, diner, restaurant, or bakery.

Vendor: Lactantia
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.79

Lactantia - PurFilter 0% Skim Milk - 1.5 L

With Lactantia PūrFiltre milk, every drop of milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresher longer than pasteurized milk* – naturally. Lactantia PūrFiltre milk contains no preservatives, like all regular milk.

Nestle - Rolo Milk Shake - 473ml

Serve your guests the wholesome flavor of this milkshake with their meals. 
This grade A milk is ultra-pasteurized to extend its shelf-life, making it perfect for supplying in your cafe, hotel breakfast bar, or bakery. Serve the milk plain with your patron's breakfast, pour over cereal, or use to create specialty lattes and teas.

It's also great for using in smoothies along with fresh cut fruit and organic yogurt to make an energy-boosting, on-the-go drink. From bakeries to fine dining establishments, milk and milk products are used to enhance almost any dish or dessert. The staple of any fridge or freezer, dairy products are essential for baking, cooking, and complementing your freshly prepared dishes. Our wide variety of milk, includes homo whole milk, skim, partly skimmed, Lactose free milk, Chocolate, Strawberry, Caramel milkshakes are important ingredients to stock at your breakfast, diner, restaurant, or bakery.
